Telegram is a good IM with many social feature. It has the secret chat 1-to-1 (but not on groups)

Probably it isn't the most secure, but Signal and Whatsapp are american software, I don't trust them very much :)

This one is also interesting: https://wire.com/

And this is coming: https://briarproject.org/
